query:
SELECT  US.FIRST_NAME AS Booker_Name, 
 SD.AIRLINE_PNR, 
SD.SP_PNR, 
 SD.TRANSACTION_ID, 
 SD.FB_BOOKING_REF_NO, 
 SD.SEGMENT_NO, 
 FB.SUPPLIER_NAME AS Supplier_Name, 
 SC.CREDENTIAL_NAME, 
 SD.BOOKING_DATE, 
 EV.TYPE_NAME, 
 EV.VALUE AS BooKing_Status, 
 SD.CURRENCY, 
 SD.FLIGHT_FARE, 
 CONCAT(PD.FIRST_NAME, ' ', PD.LAST_NAME) AS Passenger_Name 
 FROM wonderdb.TT_TS_FB_SEGMENT_DETAIL AS SD 
 INNER JOIN wonderdb.TT_ENUM_VALUES AS EV ON SD.BOOKING_STATUS = EV.INT_CODE 
 AND EV.TYPE_NAME = 'BOOKING_STATUS' 
 INNER JOIN wonderdb.TT_USER AS US ON SD.BOOKER_ID = US.USER_ID 
 INNER JOIN wonderdb.TT_TS_FLIGHT_BOOK AS FB ON SD.FB_BOOKING_REF_NO = FB.FB_BOOKING_REF_NO -- Changed LIKE to = 
 INNER JOIN wonderdb.TT_TS_FB_PASSENGER_DETAIL AS PD ON SD.FB_BOOKING_REF_NO = PD.FB_BOOKING_REF_NO -- Changed LIKE to = 
 INNER JOIN wonderdb.TT_TS_FB_INVOICE_DETAIL ID ON SD.FB_BOOKING_REF_NO = ID.FB_BOOKING_REF_NO -- Changed LIKE to = 
 INNER JOIN wonderdb.TT_TS_SUPPLIER_CREDENTIAL SC ON SC.CREDENTIAL_ID IN (ID.SEARCH_PCC_ID,ID.TICKETING_PCC_ID)-- Changed OR to IN 
 WHERE SD.AIRLINE_PNR in ('JD4GKT','PY8S7Q','7Z6ZUR','A1VBQL','R9XWUU','8EZ8YG','625928073','DKF56L','D6H6FR','RORL9U','DKGC2P','C6XWJG','CJCBB3','7XTKNB','D3FM5L','D92YCF','DH93MJ','ZJISCN','DHLQCX','YRTPMV') OR SD.SP_PNR in ('JD4GKT','PY8S7Q','7Z6ZUR','A1VBQL','R9XWUU','8EZ8YG','625928073','DKF56L','D6H6FR','RORL9U','DKGC2P','C6XWJG','CJCBB3','7XTKNB','D3FM5L','D92YCF','DH93MJ','ZJISCN','DHLQCX','YRTPMV');
